Introduction: A new face? Are you new here?#$b#Where are my manners! I'm sorry! My name's Corine! I work at the outdoor restaurant at the Ridgeside Village. Nice to meet you.$h
spring_1: I'm excited to see what this new year has in store!#$b#Good luck to everyone!$h
spring_12: Ysa is sure to bring a cute dress tomorrow. She told me she also bought a dress for me!#$b#I'm thankful, but also embarrassed!$s
spring_23: I'm looking forward to the Flower Dance tomorrow#$b#Not just because of the dance though, it's one of those rare days where I get to see all my friends in one place.$h
summer_1: Pika cooks some amazing barbecue during the summer!$h#$b#I sometimes just can't resist and buy some even if I work the counter.

summer_27: Will you be at the beach tomorrow night too? It would be amazing to have everyone I know see the beautiful scenery.#$b#Everyone deserves to take a little break right?$h

fall_15: I can't wait to win fun prizes at the fair tomorrow!#$b#I hope there's going to be some accessories too!

winter_16: I wonder if they’ll have glass beads.#$b# I was thinking of making Ysa a bracelet, you know, for being so good to me over the years.$l
winter_17: I hope you’ve found something to your liking, @!#$h#The night market leaves tonight, so make your last purchases while you can!$h
winter_24: It's going to be the end of the year soon, @. I hope you had a good one.#$b#Papa's been looking forward to spring, he hates the cold!$h
